trans-unit.source: Represents a set of line segments defined by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> with each <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> specifying the end point of a line segment.
Use this class to create a series of connected lines in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> class with the specified list of points that determine the line segments and a value indicating whether the segments are stroked.
A collection of points that determine the line segments of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the segment stroked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>..
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structures that defines this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object.

A line is drawn from the end point of the previous segment or, if this is the first segment, from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to the first point in this collection.
Lines are then drawn between each subsequent point specified in this collection.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The shape of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points*> dependency property.
To be added.
